attributes.action: Hold a National Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
attributes.additional_details:
Failure to act is unacceptable. A thorough inquiry would:

Expose systemic failings that have allowed these crimes to persist.
Ensure accountability for perpetrators and enablers.
Provide justice and support for victims.
Establish safeguards to protect vulnerable individuals in the future.
The lack of decisive action is deeply concerning and risks further unrest. We demand accountability, transparency, and justice.
attributes.background: The Government must hold an independent, nationwide inquiry into grooming gangs. This is a matter of national importance, addressing crimes so abhorrent that inaction undermines public confidence and trust.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
